info.name: Zooniverse Less Scrolling
info.description: A more compact layout to reduce the amount of scrolling up and down in project workflows on Zooniverse. Primarily aimed at the larger species option lists in the Snapshot Safari projects and the longer more detailed question tasks like Chimp&See. Task features: - Task & Tutorial bar removed, tutorial button now a side tab - Fixed size exemplar images, less position 'bounce' - Descriptive text hidden, reveal with mouse click - Less padding, less scrolling! - Footer bar hidden, most links available elsewhere List features: - Smaller margins, more space! - Single line options, neater lists! Also has an experimental portrait layout for tablet screens with larger fonts and button sizes. All feedback welcome.
